title: Martin Luther King, Jr. Memorial: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia                         Keeping the Dream Alive Excerpts from President Obama's remarks on Martin Luther King, Jr. at the memorial's 2011 dedication. Visitors attend the dedication and tour the memorial. Students recite excerpts from the "I Have A Dream" speech.  Duration:3 minutes, 32 seconds                            Soft Opening Day   11 Photos  Photos from the soft opening of the Memorial on August 22, 2011          Stone of Hope   6 Photos  Pictures of the Stone of Hope statue          Martin Luther King, Jr. Holiday 2013   16 Photos  Secretary of Interior Salazar led a group of volunteers to mulch the planters within the memorial, and a huge crowd gathered for a ceremonial wreath laying to honor the life and legacy of Martin Luther King, Jr.            South Wall Inscriptions   7 Photos  Inscriptions along the South Wall of Memorial          North Wall Inscriptions   9 Photos  Inscriptions along North Wall of Memorial                                         Keeping the Dream Alive (Audio Descriptions Version) This version of the "Keeping the Dream Alive" video contains audio descriptions provided for users with vision impairments.   Duration:3 minutes, 32 seconds
